title: Ticket #1843: condor_history with improper arguments only prints usage
description:
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=580530

Martin Kudlej 2010-04-08 09:32:16 EDT

Description of problem:

condor_history -constraint "GlobalJobId==\"machine#1.0#1270718103\"" 1.0

gets help message instead of error message.
check_ins: 2011-Jan-07 13:48   Check-in [19883]: condor_history now reports an error and usage (was just usage) when given -constraint and a restriction list, #1843 (By Matthew Farrellee )
